summary: This bill, the Veterans National Traumatic Brain Injury Treatment Act, directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a pilot program providing hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT) to veterans with traumatic brain injuries or post-traumatic stress disorder. The program will operate in three Veterans Integrated Service Networks, funded by donations to a dedicated fund. The pilot program will run for five years after the bill's enactment and defines HBOT as treatment using FDA-approved medical devices.
